title: Aryl ether-free polymer electrolytes for electrochemical and energy devices
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00186E, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Eun Joo Park, Patric Jannasch, Kenji Miyatake, Chulsung Bae, Kevin Noonan, Cy Fujimoto, Steven Holdcroft, John R. Varcoe, Dirk Henkensmeier, Michael D. Guiver, Yu Seung Kim
This review provides a depth of knowledge on the synthesis, properties and performance of aryl ether-free anion exchange polymer electrolytes for electrochemical and energy devices.
